Package iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keyagreements

This package contains the implementation classes for key agreements.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DhKeyAgreement
    This ia a Diffie-Hellman key agreement implementation that uses a PKCS#11 token to perform the actual operation.
    EcDhCoFactorKeyAgreement  
    EcDhKeyAgreement
    This is a Elliptic-Curve Diffie-Hellman key agreement implementation that uses a PKCS#11 token to perform the actual operation.
    PKCS11EcDHKeyAgreementParameterSpec
    The Class EcDHKeyAgreementParameterSpec.
    PKCS11KeyAgreement
    This is a generic base implementation for a key agreement.
    PKCS11KeyAgreementSpec
    Objects of this algorithm parameters class allows an application to control the generation of PKCS#11 keys using the provided JCE key generators.
    PKCS11KeyAgreementSpecWithKDF  
    PKCS11X942Dh2KeyAgreementParameterSpec
    The Class PKCS11X942DhKeyAgreementParameterSpec.
    PKCS11X942DhKeyAgreementParameterSpec
    The Class PKCS11X942DhKeyAgreementParameterSpec.
    PKCS11X942DhMQVKeyAgreementParameterSpec
    The Class PKCS11X942MQVKeyAgreementParameterSpec.
    X942DhKeyAgreement
    This ia a Diffie-Hellman key agreement implementation that uses a PKCS#11 token to perform the actual operation.

Package iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keyagreements Description

This package contains the implementation classes for key agreements. The base class of all key agreement implementations is PKCS11KeyAgreement. There is also a special PKCS11KeyAgreementSpec class, which can be used to provide special parameters to the token.
